short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Clean and Concise Timer Using the Pomodoro Technique

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimalist Focus Timer: Dynamic Icon & Background Power

Focus, simply. Minimalist Focus is a minimalist timer extension that empowers you to:
 - Track effortlessly: The extension icon transforms into a dynamic pie chart, reflecting your session progress at a glance
 - Stay notified seamlessly: Background notifications keep you focused and notified, even when minimized
 - Control intuitively: Pause, reset, and skip sessions with ease
 - Customize settings: Adjust individual session lengths, rounds, and more to fit your needs

Coming Soon:
 - Personalize your experience: Match colors and sounds to your flow.

Simple, Efficient, Powerful: Minimalist Focus Timer helps you maximize productivity without sacrificing simplicity.



Contact: jameskimjaewon.abc@gmail.com

This project is 100% open source. If you are a developer, you can contribute / raise issues `at https://github.com/jameskimthing/pomodoro-focus-timer
